br.gumn.persistence.util

Class AbstractDAO<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.gumn.persistence.util.AbstractDAO<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Classe persistente
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DepartmentDAO, ProjectDAO, PublicationDAO, ResearcherDAO, ResearchLineDAO, TeamDAO, UniversityDAO, UserDAO

    public abstract class AbstractDAO<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Classe abstrata responsável por fornecer encapsulamento no acesso aos dados.

    v1.23092011.1342
    Author:
